sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import PorgramDetails from '../../assets/data/HeaderInfo.json' import { ProgramDataInterface } from '../Myinterfaces/ProgramDetailsinterface'; import { MovieInterface } from '../Myinterfaces/MovieDetailsInterface'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent { externalProgramData: ProgramDataInterface = PorgramDetails.ProgramData externalMovieData: MovieInterface = PorgramDetails.MovieName }

{{ externalProgramData.programName }}

{{ externalProgramData.programCode }}

{{ externalProgramData.schedule }}

{{ externalMovieData.theatreName }}

Location: {{ externalMovieData.location }}

Contact Number: {{ externalMovieData.contactNumber }}
